txt.en: The Huorns of Fangorn are special creatures. Sometimes you need to make sacrifices, though. See if you can withstand Undúrz with all his might unleashed.
Defeat Undúrz with all four Huorns in his area dead.
To earn this deed, you must defeat Undúrz in Fangorn's Edge on Legendary difficulty with all four Huorns dead.
To earn this deed, you must defeat Undúrz in Fangorn's Edge on Legendary difficulty with all four Huorns dead.
You have defeated Undúrz in the most difficult of ways.
